string.max: should contain less than or equal {{limit}} characters
number.min: should be greater than or equal {{limit}}
number.max: should be less than or equal {{limit}}

password.minOfLowercase: should contain at least {{min}} lowercase characters

phone.internationalPhoneFormat: should be the same format as {{country}}'s international phone number format
